title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description: A premium 10% Vitamin C formulation designed for Oily, Combination skin types.
key_benefits: Vitamin C targets and reduces the appearance of dark spots.
Hyaluronic Acid supports skin's natural radiance for a brighter look.
Vitamin C helps to achieve a more luminous and even complexion.
Hyaluronic Acid contributes to the skin's overall brightening effect.
